Title: Multistorey (1)
Plot: A man accused of opening fire on a crowd from a multi storey car park, and killed a policeman, is claiming his innocence. Boyd's colleagues question his loyalties when he seems unwilling to re-investigate. As DC Mel Silver digs deeper, she discovers some disturbing truths about her boss.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Contains violence and content that may disturb
GuestStars: Saskia Wickham,  Kim Vithana,  Ony Uhiara,  Robert Pugh,  Jonathan Phillips,  Andrew Lewis,  Cliff Parisi,  Claire Johnston,  Raji James,  Jason Hughes,  Guy Henry,  Brendan Coyle,  Trevor Byfield,  Shirley Anne
